The hotel was clean and comfortable and the rooms have great views. The staff are second to none and couldnâ€™t do enough for us. A chance find and we would certainly stay again.

review: Great place .... awsm staff .....10 on 10 for hospitality .Rooms r clean and cosy .It is commendable that they r providing all the necessary facilities in a place like sisu where there is scarcity of even basic resources.
